name: Utkarsh Luthra
title: CEO, Medoc Health
bio: I am a 2x entrepreneur and the driving force behind Medoc Health, a digital healthcare platform focused on streamlining healthcare operations. I am committed to making a positive difference in the healthcare industry through technology. My passion lies in building scalable systems that solve real human problems.

experience.description: Leading the development of a digital healthcare platform to streamline hospital operations and improve patient outcomes. Built the entire tech stack from scratch using React, Node.js, and AWS. Managed a team of 5 engineers and successfully deployed to 10+ hospitals.
Developed microservices for a high-traffic e-commerce platform. Optimized database queries reducing load times by 40%. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features ahead of schedule.
Delivered 15+ web applications for clients globally. Specialized in MERN stack development and creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces.

projects.title: Medoc Health
projects.description: A comprehensive digital healthcare platform connecting hospitals, doctors, and patients. Features include appointment scheduling, EMR, and inventory management.

projects.title: Decoding Life
projects.description: My debut book exploring the intersections of technology, philosophy, and personal growth. Available on Amazon.

projects.title: AlgoVisualizer
projects.description: An interactive web application to visualize complex algorithms like Dijkstra and A* search. Built to help students understand DSA concepts.

projects.title: SmartHome Hub
projects.description: IoT dashboard for managing smart home devices. Integrates with MQTT protocols for real-time control.

videos.title: My Journey in Tech
videos.description: A brief overview of my career and what drives me.
